title: Man returns home after volcano eruption and makes a surprising find
description: Survivors in the Philippines are returning to their homes to see what is left after days of continuous eruptions from Taal volcano.

title: Record number of guns seized at US airports last year
description: More guns were seized at airports across the United States last year than ever before in the Transportation Security Administration's 18-year history, the agency reported Wednesday.

title: Downey Jr. reveals what he'll miss most about Iron Man
description: Robert Downey Jr. guest-hosted "The Ellen DeGeneres Show" ahead of the release of his new movie "Dolittle" and met a 10-year-old fan with autism whose communication skills blossomed when he got an "Iron Man" mask.

title: The Warren-Sanders feud just got way uglier
She was charged in the death of a former state senator. Now she's accused of plotting to kill victim's ex-husband
description: A woman arrested in the killing of a former Arkansas state senator is facing new charges after she attempted to hire inmates to kill her victim's ex-husband, authorities said.

title: Pelosi announces seven impeachment managers to argue case in Senate trial
Russian government resigns as Putin proposes reforms that could extend his grip on power
description: The entire Russian government is resigning, Prime Minister Dmitry Medvedev announced on Russian state television Wednesday.

title: These are the impeachment managers who will prosecute Trump
description:
• House Democrats provide new evidence of Giuliani's push to meet with Zelensky
• Erin Burnett: Someone is lying

title: The secret mission to save Australia's prehistoric trees
description: Australia's prehistoric Wollemi pine trees were saved from bushfires in a secret government mission. The trees are located in a secret location inside the 5,000-square-kilometer Wollemi National Park northwest of Sydney.

title: Spotify now has playlists for your dog, your cat and even your hamster
description: If you've ever felt guilty about leaving your dog home alone, Spotify may be able to salve your conscience -- by bringing out a podcast and range of playlists aimed at soothing lonely pets.

title: Meghan's father Thomas Markle could end up testifying against her in UK legal battle
Video appears to show two missiles striking Ukrainian passenger plane over Iran
description: A newly released video appears to show two missiles striking Ukraine International Airlines Flight 752 on January 8.

title: Meghan's father could end up testifying against her in UK legal battle
description: • Meghan makes first public appearance since stepping back from royal family

title: All-female space walk hampered by helmet issue
Experts say this is the world's biggest threat
description: American politics is the biggest threat facing the world in 2020 and the looming presidential election will stress the country's institutions, influence economic and foreign policy and further divide an already polarized electorate, with potentially huge consequences for the climate, business and investors.

title: Magnus Carlsen breaks record for longest unbeaten run in chess
description: Chess great Magnus Carlsen made history Tuesday as he extended his unbeaten run to 111 successive classical games, breaking the 110-game streak set by Sergei Tiviakov in 2005.

title: Putin 'agrees' no one should serve as president for more than two consecutive terms
6 takeaways from the Democratic debate
description:
• Analysis: Winners and losers from debate
• 10 out of 11 Dems in panel think this candidate did best

title: The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame 2020 inductees are...
description: This year's inductees to the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame were revealed Wednesday.

title: Philippines volcano: Horses and cows buried in ash
description: Images from the erupting Taal Volcano in the Philippines show a desolate landscape of destroyed houses and snapped trees covered in a thick layer of heavy ash. Half-buried bodies of horses and cows that could not escape the island lay in black sludge or floating in the surrounding lake.

title: Rich people are staying healthy for almost a decade longer than poor people
description: Rich people live healthy, disability-free lives an average of nine years longer than less wealthy people, according to a major study that lays bare the troubling economic inequalities behind lifespans in the US and UK.

title: German anger at UK star's $240 gold steak
description: Yachts, a private jet and ... a gold-plated steak.

title: Head of Sudan's ruling council calls revolt by members of country's intelligence agency a 'coup'
description: A revolt by some members of Sudan's intelligence agency was a "coup" and plot against the revolution of the Sudanese people, said Lt. Gen. Abdel-Fattah Al-Burhan, the head of the country's Sovereign Council, on Wednesday.

title: Soccer star Megan Rapinoe fronts her first luxury fashion campaign
description: "I'm an emotional dresser," said soccer star Megan Rapinoe over the phone from a training camp in Tampa, Florida, where the US Women's National Team is gearing up for the Summer Olympics.

title: At least 71 killed and dozens injured after avalanches bury homes in Pakistan
description: At least 71 people have been killed and dozens more injured in northeast Pakistan after a series of avalanches destroyed and buried houses on Tuesday.

title: Gold medalist Aly Raisman explains why she won't compete in this year's Olympics
description: Gold medal-winning gymnast Aly Raisman will not compete in this year's Olympics in Tokyo.

title: Lori Loughlin and other parents accused of withholding evidence in college scam case
description: Federal prosecutors are accusing some parents, including actress Lori Loughlin, of withholding evidence in the college admissions scam case despite requests to turn it in.

title: The best country in the world to raise a child? It's not America, survey finds
description: What's the best country in the world to raise a child? If a well developed public education system tops your list, you'd likely consider the United States -- it took the top spot in education in this year's Best Countries Report, done annually since 2016 by U.S. News & World Report and the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.

title: Dubai's horizontal tower breaks the mold
description: The Dubai skyline contains its fair share of architectural novelties and distinctive silhouettes.

title: Medicine cabinet bought for under $800 could sell for millions
description: A work by Damien Hirst originally bought for under $800 could fetch more than $2 million when it comes up for auction in London next month.

title: Australia's 'dinosaur trees' saved from bushfires by secret government mission
description: An ancient grove of pine trees whose ancestors are thought to have stood tall among dinosaurs some 200 million years ago has been saved from Australian bushfires in a covert firefighting mission.

title: How the world hears Trump's tone-deafness on democracy
description: Amid anti-government protests in Iran this past weekend, President Donald Trump did something out of character -- he issued carefully worded tweets with no spelling errors, no name-calling, no insults hurled at Democrats, and relatively less threatening language than past missives.

title: How it feels to drive the world's quickest Porsche
description: "Six G-force, your neck nearly comes off," Neel Jani grins.

title: Man's solo-duet stuns 'America's Got Talent' judges
description: Singer wows judges with his "golden duet voice"...singing male and female parts of a duet. Jeanne Moos reports.

title: Mystery of China's new SARS-like virus
description: Fears are mounting across Asia over the spread of a new coronavirus identified in China that has killed one patient and sickened dozens, as health authorities race to identify the source of the pathogen.

title: Video captures moment storm destroys school gym wall
description: A microburst destroyed a gymnasium wall and sent students running during a gym class at a North Carolina middle school.

title: A woman tried to build a bomb inside a Walmart using items she didn't pay for
description: A Florida woman is facing charges after she went to a Walmart in Tampa, got items from the shelves and started making an explosive device inside the store, authorities said.

title: Sri Lanka's leopards are under threat, but this woman is determined to save them
description: Having endured a bloody civil war from 1983 until 2009, Sri Lanka is now at peace and developing rapidly. That's good news for the country as a whole, but the island nation's leopards are under threat.

title: Hong Kong airline makes woman take pregnancy test before flying
description: A Hong Kong-based airline has apologized after it demanded a passenger take a test to prove she was not pregnant before boarding a flight to the US Pacific island of Saipan.

title: Warren appears to snub Sanders' handshake after debate
description: • Iraq War haunts the 2020 vote

title: Late-night take on Warren-Sanders spat
description: Late-night hosts Trevor Noah, Stephen Colbert and Jimmy Kimmel made fun the feud between Sens. Elizabeth Warren and Bernie Sanders, and also poked fun at the all-white debate stage.

title: A killer was released after nearly 30 years in prison. Two years later, he killed again, prosecutors say
description: Just two years ago, Timothy Chavira was released from a California prison on parole after serving nearly 30 years for killing his stepmother. He's now accused of killing someone again, authorities say.

title: 'They tried to stifle our children. As mothers, we decided to stand up.'
description: Only a month ago, 50-year-old mother Bahro Nisa was a regular New Delhi shopkeeper, making a living selling cold drinks to tourists visiting one of Asia's biggest mosques.

title: What Trump really gets from his China deal
description: The master of the art of the deal finally has a win to celebrate.

title: 60 kids injured after plane dumps jet fuel
description: More than a dozen elementary school children are being treated after a plane dumped jet fuel over a school playground near Los Angeles.
